channel.title: Local Obituaries from Fox28 and Tributes.com
channel.description: Obituaries and Online Obituaries News at Tributes.com. Find Local and National Obituaries News and Personal Tributes. Read Obituaries, Death and Funeral Notices, and Create Obituaries for Loved Ones.

item.title: Elise C. Maurig , 98, Saint Joseph, Michigan
item.description: Elsie Carolyn Maurig (nee Long), 98, was carried in the arms of angels into the presence of Jesus and loved ones waiting to welcome her Home, on March 11, 2013, after a brief illness. Elsie was born on February 7, 1915, in Benton Harbor, Michigan, to Emmett and Mary (Spading) Long. She married Joseph Maurig on March 24, 1942, and worked at Keeter's Appliances in Benton Harbor for many years. Throughout her life, Elsie's greatest joys were found in her steadfast faith in Jesus, spending time...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Frances Leta Gard, 89, Dowagiac, Michigan
item.description: Leta's life began on February 5, 1924 in Lawrence, MI the daughter of Ebert and Frances O' Donahue. She was united in marriage to Earl Way Gard on August 29, 1943 in Cass County and he preceded her in death on April 27, 1976. Leta was a very active lady. She was a waitress, cashier and lastly, she worked at Borgess-Lee Memorial Hospital in the Dietary Department. Leta was an avid bowler and golfer. She enjoyed making wedding cakes, dancing in her younger years and being with her grandchildren....
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Ruth J. May, 84, Buchanan, Michigan
item.description: Ruth J. May, age 84, of Buchanan died Saturday March 9th at Memorial Hospital South Bend. She was born June 14, 1928, in Weesaw Twp. Michigan to the late Dan & Martha (Granke) Miller who preceded her in death. Ruth is survived by her husband Maurice May who she married January 10, 1953, in Niles, Michigan. Also surviving is a daughter Kathleen (Ronald) Bush of Comstock Park, Michigan and a son Michael May of Galien. Also surviving are four grandchildren and eleven great grandchildren and...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Reinhold Pudel, 87, Saint Joseph, Michigan
item.description: Reinhold Reinhold Pudel was born on December 04, 1925 in Wsiewolodowka, Kreis Luck, Poland. He was the second youngest of 7 children who grew up on the family farm. Being the youngest son along with his younger sister they spent the summers out in the fields looking after the livestock. When the Second World War began, circumstances eventually brought about relocation by the family to the Warthegau Region. Losing their father in 1940 the mother was left with the children to continue farming....
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Denise Eidam, 57, Saint Joseph, Michigan
item.description: Denise (Clark) Eidam, 57, of St. Joseph, passed away, Friday, March 8, 2013 at Lakeland Regional Medical Center in St. Joseph. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated, 11:00 A.M. Thursday, March 14, 2013 at St. Bernard's Catholic Church, 555 E. Delaware, Benton Harbor with Fr. William J. Jacobs, Jr. officiating. Burial will follow at Calvary Cemetery, Benton Harbor. Friends may visit with the family Wednesday from 5:00 until 8:00 P.M. at Starks & Menchinger Chapel, 2650 Niles Rd., St....
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Wesley David Rice, Berrien Springs, Michigan
item.description: Wesley David Rice Carried to term, we anticipated our baby's arrival with such love and dreams of a life spent with him. Days before his delivery, we discovered he would be unable to make the transition into this world. How our hearts ached. Our precious Wesley David Rice was born sleeping in Jesus on March 7, 2013 at 4:05 a.m. at Lakeland Community Hospital in Niles, Michigan to his loving parents, Robert and Kristina Rice and his adoring brothers, Vincent and Cedric. Believing that he...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: James LoPresti, 76, Bridgman, Michigan
item.description: James August LoPresti, 76, of Bridgman, passed away Monday, March, 11, 2013, at Borgess Hospital in Kalamazoo, MI. Mass of Christian Burial will be held at 11:30 A.M Friday, March 15, 2013, at St. John's Catholic Church, 600 Columbus Ave., Benton Harbor, with Father William Jacobs Jr. officiating. Visitation will be held from 5 to 7 P.M Thursday, March 14, 2013, with the Rosary being recited at 7 P.M. at Starks & Menchinger Chapel, 2650 Niles Rd., St. Joseph. Burial will follow at Hickory...

item.title: M. Barbara Brown, C.S.C, Notre Dame, Indiana
item.description:
Sister Brown passed away on Monday, March 11, 2013.
Sister Brown was a resident of Notre Dame, Indiana.

item.title: Dale A. Lorenz, 77, Elkhart, Indiana
item.description:
Dale was born on April 21, 1935 and passed away on Sunday, March 10, 2013.
Dale was a resident of Elkhart, Indiana at the time of his passing.
He was preceded in death by his wife Mary.
There will be no services at this time and cremation will take place.
Memorial contributions may be given to Elkhart Hospice House.

item.title: Charlotte Edel, 88, Milford, Indiana
item.description:
Charlotte was born on November 18, 1924 and passed away on Sunday, March 10, 2013.
Charlotte was a resident of Milford, Indiana at the time of her passing.
A funeral service in honor of Charlotte will be held at 5 PM on Wednesday, March 13, 2013 at Mishler Funeral Home, Bremen. Pastor John Perkinson will officiate. Burial will take place in the Bremen Cemetery at a later time. Friends may call from 3-5 PM on Wednesday at the funeral home.
Memorials may be given to the Bremen VFW...

item.title: Dolores L. Finnigan, 92, South Bend, Indiana
item.description: "Our Mother left us quietly, Her thoughts unknown. But left us a memory We are proud to own. So treasure her, Lord, In your garden of rest, For when on earth, Mother was one Of your best." Dolores L. Finnigan, 92, formerly of Brookfield St., South Bend, passed away on Sunday March 10, 2013, in her daughter's home. She was born on May 6, 1920, in Chicago, IL, to the late John P. and Myrtle (Filkens) Kenney. On September 28, 1940, as Dolores Kenney, she married Gerald...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Kaleb Russell Luce, 17, Albion, Indiana
item.description:
Kaleb was born on April 24, 1925 and passed away on Saturday, March 9, 2013.
Kaleb was a resident of Albion, Indiana at the time of his passing.
Funeral Services will be on Thursday, March 14, 2013 at 11:00 in the Central Noble High School Auditorium in Albion. Burial will follow at the Rose Hill Cemetery in Albion. item.title: Frances Rose Herzog, 88, Benton Harbor, Michigan
item.description: God's faithful servant, Frances Rose Herzog, 88, was welcomed into her heavenly home on Saturday, March 9, surrounded by her loving family. She was born in Benton Harbor on October 19, 1924 to George & Zora (Hosbein) Gaunder, Sr. She married Paul Herzog, Jr. at St. John's in Benton Harbor in 1945 and together they raised 8 children. The only thing more important to her than her family was the Catholic faith that was engraved upon her heart. Frances is survived by her children: Paul Herzog...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Edward Paul Jittler, 78, South Bend, Indiana
item.description: SOUTH BEND - Edward Paul Jittler, age 78, passed away peacefully to be with the Lord on Saturday, March 9, 2013 in South Bend, Indiana with his wife and son at his side. Ed was born on November 12, 1934 in Elizabeth, New Jersey to Frederick and Emma Jittler who preceded him in death. He served in the US Army from August 1957 to August 1959 then worked for RCA as a service technician. On April 22, 1967 he married Helen Mary Sandfort and they made their residence in North Brunswick, New...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Wayne M. Baney, 85, South Bend, Indiana
item.description: Wayne M. Baney, 85, of South Bend, Indiana, passed away on Saturday, March 9, 2013 at Ironwood Health & Rehabilitation Center in South Bend. He was born on June 13, 1927 to the late John Wayne and Hazel Mae (Harrison) Baney in South Bend, IN and was a lifelong area resident. Along with his parents; Wayne was preceded in death by a son, John W. Baney; a granddaughter, Jennifer Bely; two sisters; and seven brothers. Wayne served our country in the U.S. Army Air Corp during both World War II and...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Laurance A. McCabe, 84, Dowagiac, Michigan
item.description: Laurance A. "Mike" McCabe, 84, of Dowagiac, died early Saturday morning, March 9, 2013, in Borgess-Lee Memorial Hospital of natural causes. He was born July 20, 1928 in Walkerton, Indiana to Reuland and Arlene (Studley) McCabe. His parents preceded him in death. Laurence married Betty Rowley on September 20, 1951 in Angola, Indiana. She survives. Mike moved to Cassopolis with his parents in 1940 where he went to school. He earned his Eagle Scout rank in 1944. He graduated in 1946 from...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Joyce Main, 88, Bremen, Indiana
item.description:
Joyce was born on January 2, 1925 and passed away on Friday, March 8, 2013.
Joyce was a resident of Bremen, Indiana at the time of her passing.
She was preceded in death by her husband Harold.
Funeral services will be held at 2pm on Wednesday, March 13, 2013, at Grace Fellowship Church, 535 South Birkey Street, Bremen, IN with Pastor Jon Hueni officiating. The family will receive visitors at the church from 12pm to 1:30pm prior to the service. Burial will follow the service at the...

item.title: Alan Wayne Hiner, 33, Osceola, Indiana
item.description: Alan Wayne Hiner Jr., 33, of Ash Road, Osceola, passed away at Elkhart General Hospital on Friday, March 8th. He was born in Elkhart on July 7th, 1979. He is survived by his wife, Rachel and his mother, Pauline Ottman of Elkhart and his father, Alan Hiner Sr. of Florida. Also surviving are his children, Destiny Hiner and Brandon Atchison, both of Elkhart, Kaden Wayne Hiner, Talon Hiner and Starke Hiner and Aerionna Hiner, all of Osceola. His sister, Amber Hiner and brother, Andrew Hiner, both...

item.title: Thomas S. Watson, 74, Mishawaka, Indiana
item.description: Thomas S. Watson, 74, of Mishawaka, IN, passed away Friday March 8, 2013, in his home, surrounded by his family. Tom was born on April 16, 1938, in South Bend, IN, to the late Samuel and Erma (Johnson) Watson. On August 4, 1962, in South Bend, IN, Tom was married to Diane (Mourer), who survives. Also surviving are 2 sons; Tom (Celena) Watson, of Argos, IN, Tim (Lisa) Watson, of North Liberty, IN, 3 grandchildren, Meghan, Austin, Anna Watson, 3 sisters, Judy Zielinski, of Mishawaka, IN, Rachel ...

item.title: Dolores Irene DeLaurelle, 87, Mishawaka, Indiana
item.description: Dolores Irene DeLaurelle, 87, of Mishawaka, passed away on Friday, March 8, 2013 in the Springer Heath Care Center of Mishawaka. Dolores was born in Mishawaka on April 30, 1925 to the late Joseph and Emma (Byl) Witz. On February 7, 1943 in Mishawaka she married Norman Paul DeLaurelle. He preceded her in death on February 17, 1988. Dolores was a member of the East United Methodist Church. She enjoyed crocheting, reading, doing aerobics, watching sports, and traveling. Dolores is survived by her...
item.author: Tributes.com

item.title: Gary E. Sherwood, 69, South Bend, Indiana
item.description: Gary E. Sherwood, 69, of South Bend, Indiana passed away at 8:31 a.m. Friday, March 8, 2013 in Indiana University Health Methodist Hospital, Indianapolis, Indiana. He was born on October 4, 1943 to the late George M. and Ethel (Miller) Sherwood in South Bend, Indiana, and was a lifelong resident. Along with his parents; one sister, Marilyn Lippincott; and one brother, Rolland Sherwood also preceded him in death. Gary graduated in 1962 from South Bend Central High School. He retired in...

item.title: Mildred Alene Penwell, 94, Buchanan, Michigan
item.description:
Mildred was born on August 15, 1918 and passed away on Thursday, March 7, 2013.
Mildred was a resident of Buchanan, Michigan at the time of her passing.
She was preceded in death by her husband Harry.

item.description:
Gene was born on June 11, 1944 and passed away on Thursday, March 7, 2013.

item.description:

item.title: Clyde P. Sanborn, 95, Bremen, Indiana
item.description:
Clyde was born on September 19, 1917 and passed away on Thursday, March 7, 2013.
Clyde was a resident of Bremen, Indiana at the time of his passing.
He was preceded in death by his wife Fern.

item.title: Helen G. Thorpe, 83, Granger, Indiana
item.description:
Helen was born on September 17, 1929 and passed away on Thursday, March 7, 2013.
Helen was a resident of Granger, Indiana at the time of her passing.
She is survived by her husband Rolland.
Helen requested no memorial service; however, friends are welcome to stop by the Moreland residence to offer condolences and to join the family in remembering Helen on Sunday, March 10, 2013, from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m. Elkhart Cremation Services is entrusted with arrangements.

item.title: Chris V. Michalos, 91, South Bend, Indiana
item.description: Chris V. Michalos passed away peacefully in his residence on Thursday, March 7. His wife, Josephine (Cwill) Michalos, predeceased him in 2008 after 63 years of marriage, and a brother, Fred V. Michalos, in 2001. Three children survive: Bruce R. and Gregory V.
